instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00840 water damage
threads.message:
Hey guys i got one of these boards in. few patches of water damage. good thing is it is very recent. It is still booting but wanted to make sure and clean b0ard - i fluxed the affected areas and reflowed components. the only thing is c6499 is badly corroded and missing one end. I dont have any donor boards but before i make order i would like to test rest of machine. Would it be best to pull this cap off board for the time being. Will it cause more damage if I do?

its only 3pf! and looks like it power audio amplifiers. thanks

threads.title: 820-00840 water damage
threads.message: will it be problem if not replaced?

threads.title: 820-00840 water damage
threads.message:
Not at all.
Is just an EMI filter...
